content.raw: The `LoadPlugin` event expects `ElementPtr`. I think it's this way to be generic, it can be used for world, model or sensor plugins.
content.html: The LoadPlugin event expects ElementPtr. I think it's this way to be generic, it can be used for world, model or sensor plugins.

content.raw: Is it possible to use the SDF Sensor DOM object instead of `sdf::ElementPtr`?
content.html: Is it possible to use the SDF Sensor DOM object instead of sdf::ElementPtr?

content.raw: Tests added, I think this is good to go
content.html: Tests added, I think this is good to go

content.raw: I'm okay breaking anything and everything. Pull out the :hammer:

content.raw:
Argh the [scoped name question](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/166/a-7-allow-programmatic-loading-of-plugins/diff#comment-91855381) changes everything when we're dealing with sensors.

@{nkoenig}, are you ok breaking the pattern and using scoped names for sensors? I'll leave worlds and models as they are.
content.html:
Argh the scoped name question changes everything when we're dealing with sensors.

@Nate Koenig, are you ok breaking the pattern and using scoped names for sensors? I'll leave worlds and models as they are.
